00036 #define EXP_FILE "../../../file/CPPTest/data/full.EXP"

00048 /*! Test the ability to create the ArrayFileReader class. */
00049 void FusionArrayFileReaderTest::testCreation()
00050 {
00051         FusionArrayFileReader *reader = new FusionArrayFileReader;
00052         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(reader != NULL);
00053         delete reader;
00054 }
00055 
00056 /*! Test the handling of attempting to read an invalid array file. */
00057 void FusionArrayFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_invalid_file()
00058 {
00059         FusionArrayFileReader reader;
00060         ArrayData data;
00061         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( reader.Read(INVALID_FILE, data) == false);
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.ArraySetFileIdentifier() == "");
00063         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.DataTypeIdentifier() == "");
00064         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.PhysicalArraysAttributes().size() == 0);
00065         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.UserAttributes().size() == 0);
00066 }
00067 
00068 /*! Test the handling of attempting to read an array file that does not exist. */
00069 void FusionArrayFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_missing_file()
00070 {
00071         FusionArrayFileReader reader;
00072         ArrayData data;
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( reader.Read("no_file", data) == false);
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.ArraySetFileIdentifier() == "");
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.DataTypeIdentifier() == "");
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.PhysicalArraysAttributes().size() == 0);
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.UserAttributes().size() == 0);
00078 }

00080 /*! Test the ability to read a valid Calvin array file. */
00081 void FusionArrayFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_calvin_array_file()
00082 {
00083         FusionArrayFileReader reader;
00084         ArrayData array;
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( reader.Read(CALVIN_FILE, array) == true);
00086 
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.DataTypeIdentifier() == ARRAY_SET_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER );
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.ArraySetFileIdentifier() == std::string("432-432-432-432"));
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.CreatedStep() == ArrayRegistrationStep);
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.InitialProject() == L"my_project");
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.CreationDateTime() == L"8/12/2005 9:00AM");
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.CreatedBy() == L"ljevon");
00093 
00094         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.PhysicalArraysAttributes().size() == 1);
00095 
00096         ArrayAttributes &atts = array.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0];
00097 
00098         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.Identifier() == "123-123-123-123");
00099         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.ArrayName() == "mychip");
00100         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.ArrayBarcode() == "@1234567890");
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.Media() == PlateOrStripMedia);
00102         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.MediaRow() == 1);
00103         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.MediaCol() == 12);
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.MasterFile() == "Test3.master");
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.MasterFileId() == "123-123-123-123");
00106         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.PatAssignment() == AffyBarcodeAssignment);
00107         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.CreationDateTime() == L"8/12/2005 10:00AM");
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.CreatedBy() == L"ljevon");
00109         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.CreatedStep() == ScanningStep);
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.Comment() == L"here is a comment");
00111 
00112         ParameterNameValuePairVector &params = atts.Attributes();
00113         ParameterNameValuePairVector::iterator paramIt = params.begin();
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( params.size() == 2);
00115         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*paramIt).Name == L"SampleID");
00116         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*paramIt).Value == L"433232");
00117         ++paramIt;
00118         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*paramIt).Name == L"LIMS System");
00119         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*paramIt).Value == L"Nautilis");
00120 
00121 
00122         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList &userParams = array.UserAttributes();
00123         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( userParams.size() == 6 );
00124 
00125         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList::iterator userIt = userParams.begin();
00126         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Species" );
00127         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"Homo Sapien" );
00128         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == true );
00129         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00130         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType);
00131         ++userIt;
00132         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Individual" );
00133         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"me" );
00134         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00135         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00136         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType);
00137         ++userIt;
00138         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"When" );
00139         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"now" );
00140         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00141         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00142         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TimeParameterType);
00143         ++userIt;
00144         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"How much" );
00145         const double eps = 1e-5;
00146         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL( (*userIt).GetValueFloat(), 1.0, eps);
00147         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00148         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00149         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::FloatParameterType);
00150         ++userIt;
00151         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Sex" );
00152         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"" );
00153         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00154         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::ControlMultiParameterType);
00155 
00156         std::list<std::wstring>::iterator cit = (*userIt).ControlMultiValues().begin();
00157         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Male" );
00158         ++cit;
00159         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Other" );
00160 
00161         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 4 );
00162         cit = (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().begin();
00163         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Male" );
00164         ++cit;
00165         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Female" );
00166         ++cit;
00167         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Unknown" );
00168         ++cit;
00169         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Other" );
00170         ++userIt;
00171         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Age" );
00172         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"30 something" );
00173         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00174         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType);
00175         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00176         ++userIt;
00177         CPPUNIT_ASSERT (userIt == userParams.end() );
00178 
00179 
00180 }

00182 /*! Test the ability to read an Data Transfer Tool formated array file. */
00183 void FusionArrayFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_dtt_array_file()
00184 {
00185         FusionArrayFileReader reader;
00186         ArrayData data;
00187         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( reader.Read(MAGE_FILE, data) == true);
00188 
00189         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.ArraySetFileIdentifier() == std::string(""));
00190         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.PhysicalArraysAttributes().size() == 1);
00191         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Identifier() == "");
00192         const ParameterNameValuePairVector &arrayParams = data.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes();
00193         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( arrayParams.size() == 1 );
00194         ParameterNameValuePairVector::const_iterator arrayIt = arrayParams.begin();
00195         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*arrayIt).Name == L"Probe Array Type" );
00196         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*arrayIt).Value == L"Test3" );
00197 
00198 
00199         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList &userParams = data.UserAttributes();
00200         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( userParams.size() == 33 );
00201         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList::iterator userIt = userParams.begin();
00202         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"GCOS Sample Name" );
00203         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"Sample_with_Sample_Template" );
00204         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00205         ++userIt;
00206         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Sample Template Name" );
00207         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"MIAME Sample Information" );
00208         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00209         userIt = userParams.end();
00210         --userIt;
00211         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Grid Alignment Passed" );
00212         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"" );
00213         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00214 }
00215 
00216 /*! Test the ability to read an Micro Array Suit formated array file (EXP).  */
00217 void FusionArrayFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_mas_array_file()
00218 {
00219         FusionArrayFileReader reader;
00220         ArrayData data;
00221         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( reader.Read(EXP_FILE, data) == true);
00222 
00223         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.ArraySetFileIdentifier() == std::string(""));
00224         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.PhysicalArraysAttributes().size() == 1);
00225         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Identifier() == "");
00226         const ParameterNameValuePairVector &arrayParams = data.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes();
00227         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( arrayParams.size() == 1 );
00228         ParameterNameValuePairVector::const_iterator arrayIt = arrayParams.begin();
00229         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*arrayIt).Name == L"Probe Array Type" );
00230         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*arrayIt).Value == L"Test3" );
00231 
00232         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList &userParams = data.UserAttributes();
00233         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( userParams.size() == 8 );
00234         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList::iterator userIt = userParams.begin();
00235         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Chip Lot" );
00236         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"123" );
00237         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00238         ++userIt;
00239         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Operator" );
00240         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"ljevon" );
00241         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00242         ++userIt;
00243         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Sample Type" );
00244         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"s_type" );
00245         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00246         ++userIt;
00247         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Description" );
00248         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"Demo data" );
00249         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00250         ++userIt;
00251         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Project" );
00252         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"s_proj" );
00253         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00254         ++userIt;
00255         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Comments" );
00256         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"None" );
00257         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00258         ++userIt;
00259         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Solution Type" );
00260         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"sol type" );
00261         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00262         ++userIt;
00263         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Solution Lot" );
00264         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"123123" );
00265         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00266         ++userIt;
00267 }
